txt.en: 'Enough talk. Now we act! We Beornings will make quick work of these spider-folk, just you wait!'
'The honey cakes are cooling, and we are as prepared as one could imagine. Come, let us deal with these Ungoledain like the nest of hornets... or, I suppose, web of spiders that they are!'
You should talk with Threkmóth, in Skoghús, and let him know you are prepared for the journey to Kêr Bréin.
You should talk to Threkmóth back at Skoghús, the Thornholt.

'You fought well, [placeholder] and we drove the Ungoledain out of Thornholt. I fear that I am responsible for the injury to Vaskorn. I - I was preoccupied and did not weigh the threat with the gravity it deserved. He now lies silent, my hope is the brown wizard's protection will also heal him.'
Threkmóth and his folk have taken the poison-protecting potion in preparation for the assault on the Ungoledain... and possible rescue of Vaskorn.
